nodes.text: Ses Jopp was a male Zabrak soldier in the Galactic Republic military during the Cold War. Jopp held a hatred of Larin Moxla, calling her "Toxic Moxla." However, when dispatched to Sebaddon to help eradicate the hex droids, he assisted Moxla and befriended her. After the battle, which Jopp survived, Moxla considered organizing a Special Forces squad made up of Sebaddon survivors, and she considered asking Jopp to join.
